import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";//useState and useEffect
import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RunningExercise=()=>{const[time,setTime]=useState(0);const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);const[laps,setLaps]=useState([]);// followed pattern from duration exercise
const formatTime=time=>{const minutes=Math.floor(time/1000/60%60);const seconds=Math.floor(time/1000%60);const milliseconds=Math.floor(time%1000/10);return`${minutes.toString().padStart(2,"0")}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2,"0")}:${milliseconds.toString().padStart(2,"0")}`;};//start
const startLap=()=>{setIsRunning(true);};//stop
const stopLap=()=>{setIsRunning(false);setLaps([...laps,time]);};//reset
const resetLap=()=>{setIsRunning(false);setTime(0);};//utilizing week 6 powerpoint 
useEffect(()=>{let intervalId;if(isRunning){intervalId=setInterval(()=>{setTime(prevTime=>prevTime+10);},10);}else{clearInterval(intervalId);}return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[isRunning]);//utilizing week 6 powerpoint 
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Timer: ",formatTime(time)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"start-button",onClick:startLap,disabled:isRunning,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"stop-button",onClick:stopLap,disabled:!isRunning,children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"reset-button",onClick:resetLap,children:"Reset"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Laps:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:laps.map((lap,index)=>/*#__PURE__*///map
_jsxs("div",{children:["Lap ",index+1,": ",formatTime(lap)]},index))})]});};export default RunningExercise;
